posts.post_content:
Does anyone have a Henry Reccius Honus Wagner reprint that Leland's was giving away a few years ago to promote the auction?  I'm looking to add one to my collection, and was hoping someone on the board my have one for sale?

Please either email [URL="honuswagner13@verizon.net"][/URL] or PM me with your price.

Thanks,
Tony

Thanks to a fellow board member, the card arrived today.

Tony
